channel.title: How can i make a server of my own?
channel.description: can someone tell me how to start a server of my own so i can put all the stuff in it and place the npc's and stuff

item.title: How can i make a server of my own?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

mr.b0ss:

plz tell me how can i play moparscape!

Goto this address Moparscape, and the client should load. If it doesnt load, then you need to download the Java runetime enironment, but you should download the JDK because it is used to cmopile servers if you plan on building them.

wOoP:

can someone tell me how to start a server of my own so i can put all the stuff in it and place the npc’s and stuff

First off you can use my program to build you a server (second link below), then as Danie said, goto the tutorial section and look at all of the tutorials on changing the Java files of the sources. If you continue to need help, use my tutorial (first link below) and it will teach you a lot about building a server.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a server of my own?
